body.text:
This is what happens when your page loads are blocked by server.

For the last decade, SPAs have made it hard for devs to block navigation on bad decisions. Before Angular and React, most websites felt like this, because every click requested a new HTML page and the server took https://t.co/oX56ggoDB0
